010package imagingbook.lib.interpolation;
011
012import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014import imagingbook.lib.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
015
016
017public class LanczosInterpolator implements PixelInterpolator {
018        
019        private final int n;    // order (tap count) of this interpolator
020        
021        public LanczosInterpolator(ScalarAccessor ia) {
022                this(2);
023        }
024        
025        public LanczosInterpolator(int n) {
026                this.n = n; // order >= 2
027        }
028        
029        @Override
030        public float getInterpolatedValue(ScalarAccessor ia, double x, double y) {
031                final int u0 = (int) Math.floor(x); // use floor to handle negative coordinates too
032                final int v0 = (int) Math.floor(y);
033                double q = 0;
034                for (int j = 0; j <= 2 * n - 1; j++) {
035                        int v = v0 + j - n + 1;
036                        double p = 0;
037                        for (int i = 0; i <= 2 * n - 1; i++) {
038                                int u = u0 + i - n + 1;
039                                p = p + wLn(x - u) * ia.getVal(u, v);
040                        }
041                        q = q + wLn(y - v) * p;
042                }
043                return (float) q;
044        }
045        
046        
047        static final double pi = Math.PI;
048        static final double pi2 = sqr(pi);
049        
050        private double wLn(double x) { // 1D Lanczos interpolator of order n
051                double r = Math.abs(x);
052                if (r < 0.001) return 1.0;
053                if (r < n) {
054                        return n * (Math.sin(pi * r / n) * Math.sin(pi * r)) / (pi2 * sqr(r));
055                }
056                else return 0.0;
057        }
058
059
060}
